channel.title: Netbook to monitor
channel.description:
I am connecting my netbook to an external monitor and it works fine if i extend my display onto it, but if i want to make it the primary display it doesnt work, just stays black. Pressing fn+f5 does nothing. halp?????
edit: ok nevermind, i went into the intel graphics driver and it had option :S

item.title: Netbook to monitor
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

I am connecting my netbook to an external monitor and it works fine if i extend my display onto it, but if i want to make it the primary display it doesnt work, just stays black. Pressing fn+f5 does nothing. halp???

edit: ok nevermind, i went into the intel graphics driver and it had option :S
